title.rendered: Can I Customize Which File Types Dumpster Will Save?

content.rendered:
Yes, you can easily customize your Dumpster app settings to only store certain file types. 

To do so, tap on the “More” tab located at the bottom right-hand corner of the screen. Then, tap “Recycle Bin Settings” at the top of the screen. Here you can easily choose which file types you would like Dumpster to save.
